caption: I got the invisibility potion and thought I'd cruise through the rest of the level, but hilariously, you seem to only be able to sprinkle it on yourself a bit at time like the other potions. This acid bag thing showed up, and I was only 22% invisible, so I ran and tried to make myself more invisible. Then, it caught up, and I ran again.
